creator: jubelo
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Roomedit{x <vnum> / <new> (vnum) / reload

{Wroomedit new (vnum):{x
     This will start a new room with the vnum of (vnum).

{Wroomedit (vnum):{x
     This begins editing the room with vnum of (vnum).
     
{Wroomedit reload:{x
     This saves and reloads the rooms in the current area.

{WAvailable options while editing a room:{x
     {Bbuilder{W:{x Sets the builders name for this room.
     {Bname{W:{x Sets name of the room.
     {Bvnum{W:{x Sets the vnum of the room you are editing.
     {Bdescription{W:{x Enters you into the description editor buffer.
     {Bpropertyvalue{W:{x Enter the property value of this room.
     {Bflags{W:{x Enter the flags for this room.
     {Bsectortype{W:{x Enter the sector types.
     {Bextradescriptions{W:{x Sets any extra descriptions for this room.

{WWhen in the description buffer:{x
     Please type {W.h{x while in the buffer for help regarding editing.
